Text: Seriously? you're posting John Stossel? The guy is a Libertarian. There is no reason to say more to explain why he has nothing intelligent to say, but he's a "20/20" and "Good Morning America" type of reporter with an immensely annoying monotone voice who now works for FoxNews. He's Bill O'Reilly's libertarian punk bitch, an utter moron.
Thank you skJGZV6z and all those who appreciate freedom and understand what the loss would mean...
